title: Requires the renewal of firearms licenses after five years outside the city of New York
summary: Requires the renewal of firearms' licenses after five years and the taking of a safety course outside the city of New York; sets a date for expiration and provides for a schedule for recertification to be developed by the commissioner of criminal justice services.
